title: CPS Governance: Email Log, January 2025, Jitu Brown

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

A log of all emails to/from the CPS Board Member, Jitu Brown, from January 1, 2025 - January 31, 2025. Board Member Brown indicated that he is receiving "many emails" and "phone calls".

1. Please search all CPS email accounts as well as personal accounts used for public business. The log should include but not be limited to: sender, recipient(s), date and time, subject line, and attachment.

2. A log of all phone calls and messages for Board Member Jitu Brown from January 1, 2025 - January 31, 2025. The message log should include but not be limited to caller, date and time, message content.

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on 02/20/2025

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on 02/20/2025
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: 02/20/2025
Location: High Pines neighborhood, Miami-Dade County, FL
Suspect: Tykwon Anderson, 20
Incident Summary: Deputies arrested Anderson in connection with a burglary at the home of University of Miami quarterback Carson Beck. Anderson and three others allegedly broke in around 2:45 a.m., stole a garage opener from a white Range Rover, and used it to enter the residence, where they took vehicle key fobs. Surveillance footage captured the stolen vehicles leaving the neighborhood. Bodycam footage reportedly includes interactions with both Beck and his girlfriend, Hanna Cavinder, as well as the arrest of Anderson.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the burglary and theft.
Arrested Tykwon Anderson.
Interacted with Carson Beck and Hanna Cavinder.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
